location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘ROUGH MAP OF LT. COL. GOLDSMID AND MAJOR SMITH’S ROUTE FROM ISPAHAN TO CHOUBAR AND BOUNDER ABBAS'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:536 x 566 mm, on sheet 660 x 670 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Lith.d in the Office of the Superint. Engineer P.D. April 1866. Bombay. (Signed) R.M. Smith Major R.E.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Map showing Lieutenant-Colonel Goldsmid and Major Smith's route from Ispahan to Choubar [Chombar] and Bunder Abbas, with boundaries indicated by pink lines and labelled for reference.
